description:
Completely redesigned for the 2012/13 season!

We kidnapped and locked a team of hackers deep inside an undisclosed mountain for the last year to take the #1 Ski Tracking App on iPhone to a whole new level. No we can't tell you where they are located, but what we can tell you is what they have in store will blow your mind. Literally.

Download to instantly access snow conditions, forecasts, powder alerts, and offline trail maps - now supporting 2,000+ ski areas worldwide. Then hit the slopes and track your day at any mountain with the most advanced ski tracker on iPhone.

If you live, breathe, and love winter - download AllSnow twice, tell everyone you know, and then hit the slopes!

-------------

Here is everything you can do with AllSnow:

WEATHER
• Snow conditions for 2,000+ ski areas worldwide
• Weather & snow forecasts for every ski area
• Powder Alerts to notify you of recent snowfall

SKI AREA INFO
• Easily locate nearby ski areas using GPS
• High resolution & zoomable trail maps
• Driving directions to get you to the slopes
• Discounted lift tickets for participating resorts

TRACKING
• Hit start to track your entire day on the slopes
• Uses built-in GPS so no cellular signal required
• Stats like runs, vertical drop, top speed & more
• The FIRST & ONLY app with a breakdown of runs by name for 400+ supported ski areas


TOP SECRET (coming soon):
• Buddy tracking to find friends on the slopes
• Compete with friends & others skiers/riders
• And a whole lot more...

NOTE: Make sure you save a mountain resort to your favorites for full offline capabilities.

-------------

COMPATIBILITY
• GPS Tracker only supported on iPhone 4 & up
• Continued use of the GPS Tracker running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life
• Requires iOS 5.0+

SUPPORT
Please email us at iphone-support@allsnow.com for support, issues, or feature requests.
trackCensoredName: AllSnow Ski Reports, Snow Forecasts, Offline Trail Maps, & GPS Tracker
